page.title: 03REPORTING
page.content: The local evening newspapers are called the Argus and weekly News Argus. They contain letters and adverts, as local news. People in the area are concerned about the By-Pass, a new road running through Risca, some work continuing on the end part. Usually, on the front page, there is some news about the miners, after having a year long strike. In Pontymister, there are factories causing pollution. Many inhabitants dislike the pollution, covering more and more of the area. On Ty-Sign Estate a good view can be obtained.Also,rugby can be seen and played, giving alot of enjoyment. Schools and sport winners are often seen with photographs, particularly the comprehensives. Many local people win tournaments in different sports.
